p: Culture media and supplements were obtained from Gibco unless indicated otherwise. Baby Hamster Kidney (BHK-21) cells were maintained in Glasgow minimum essential medium (GMEM) supplemented with 4% tryptose phosphate broth, 1% minimum essential medium nonessential amino acids (MEM NEAA), 1% antibiotic/antimycotic (a/a) and 5% foetal bovine serum (FBS), at 37°C with 5% CO 2. Vero-E6 cells were maintained in minimum essential medium (MEM) supplemented with 1% a/a, 5% FBS, 1% glutamine and 1% MEM NEAA, at 37°C with 5% CO 2. BHK-21 and Vero-E6 cells were purchased from ATCC.
